name: getLastCriticalCareDailyAssessmentAllPatients
description: Get the last compositon for each patient for Critical Care Daily Assessment

steps.processorData:
select
    a/name/value,
    a/context/start_time/value as created,
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as authority,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value/value as Critical_Care_Admission_Date,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0074]/value/value as Level_of_Care,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0137]/value/value as First_intubation_date,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0155]/value/value as extubation_date,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0014]/value/magnitude as FiO2,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0040]/value/value as Spontaneous_or_Mandatory_Mode,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0156]/value/value as Suitable_for_re_intubation,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0048]/value/value as Resuscitation_Status,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0102]/value/value as Resp_Dysfunction,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0103]/value/value as CVS_Dysfunction,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0104]/value/value as CNS_Dysfunction,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0105]/value/value as Renal_Dysfunction,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0072]/value/magnitude as Fluid_balance_at_08_00,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0051]/items[at0097]/value/magnitude as Acuity_Score,
    squash(b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0166]/value/value) as Co_morbidities
from EHR e contains 
top 1
COMPOSITION a
contains EVALUATION b_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.critical_care_daily_assessment.v0]
where a/archetype_details/template_id/value='Critical Care Daily Assessment'
order by created desc
offset 0 limit 10000
